EmailTemplate.name: New User SSOv2
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Kukulu with Single Sign-On!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Please go to CEA Salesforce & CCT Slack to access the Kukulu Single Sign-on link and look for my latest post!
Take the following steps to save the URL as a Bookmark in your browser to easily access Salesforce.com in the future: (steps are customized for Google Chrome)
1. Click the star icon found at the far right side of the address bar
2. Click in the 'Name' field and type the name you wish for it to be called (e.g. "Kukulu SSO")
3. Ensure that "Bookmarks Bar" is the selected folder
4. Click "Finished"
Please notify your Salesforce Administrator for any login issues.
Kukulu Administration
Important links:
Merge Trailhead Account(s)
CEA Salesforce & CCT Slack
